ValidationRule.description: Validates Work Email field if unique. Must not be the same with Email, Student Email, or Staff Email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT (ISBLANK(hed__WorkEmail__c) ), OR( IF(hed__WorkEmail__c= Email, true, false) , IF(hed__WorkEmail__c= QUT_Learner_Email__c, true, false) , IF(hed__WorkEmail__c= QUT_Staff_Email__c , true, false) ) )
